title:
How many English people living in Wilmington?

Are there any English pubs, resturants in the area?  as well as clubs or meeting places?
text:
Here's a link to a previous MyReporter.com post that should answer
most of your question: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3533



As for how many English people are living in Wilmington,that's hard
to say. Here's a link to U.S. Census Bureau data about Wilmington's
residents: http://quickfacts.census.gov/qfd/states/37000.html
